Sun Therapy

Discover the healing power of controlled sun exposure

Sun Therapy

The healing benefits of controlled sun exposure.

Vitamin D synthesis
Improved mood
Better sleep
Enhanced immunity
Natural energy

Sun Exposure Practices

Morning Sun

Benefits of early morning sun exposure.

Afternoon Sun

Safe practices for midday sun exposure.

Precautions

  • Check UV index
  • Use sunscreen
  • Wear protective clothing
  • Stay hydrated
  • Monitor skin changes

Best Times

  • Early morning (6-8 AM)
  • Late afternoon (4-6 PM)
  • Avoid peak hours (10 AM-4 PM)
  • Consider season
  • Check weather conditions

Health Benefits

Physical Benefits

  • Vitamin D production
  • Bone health
  • Immune system support
  • Skin conditions
  • Blood pressure regulation

Mental Benefits

  • Mood enhancement
  • Stress reduction
  • Better sleep
  • Increased energy
  • Mental clarity
